details: Experience gained in the Enchanted Lakes area is increased by 100%.
Experience gains are increased by 50% for all professions.
The quantity of Nettles harvested by alchemists is increased by 125%.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 150% against Fangs of Glass monsters.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Akwadala area are increased by 100%.
Experience gained in Lord Crow's Library is increased by 125%.
An extra challenge is generated for fights against Tears of Ouronigride monsters.
The quantity of Breaded Fish, Shiny Sardine, Kralove, and Grey Sea Bream harvested by fishermen is increased by 150%.
The chances of obtaining loot from Lousy Pig Shepherds are increased by 150%.
All varieties of Ebony Dragoturkey will give birth to one extra baby.
The reward bonus on groups of monsters increases every 3 hours in the Dreggons' Sanctuary area.

The experience points awarded for completing alignment quests and city order quests are increased by 100%. What's more, a special repeatable quest is available today inside the militias of Bonta and Brakmar. It is available to aligned players of level 20 or higher and is not attached to the offering quest.
The quantity of Flax harvested by farmers is increased by 125%.
Experience gained by fighting Petrified Forest monsters is increased by 75%.
Jewellers save 10% of their ingredients when they craft items.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Icefields area are increased by 100%.
Experience gained in Brouce Boulgoure's Clearing is increased by 100%.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 200% in the Skeleton Dungeon.
Experience gains and the chances of dropping loot are increased by 75% against all monsters considered to be pirates.
The quantity of Fresh Meat picked up by hunters is increased by 125%.
The quality of items crafted in the city of Brakmar is increased.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 200% in the Feudala area.
The chances of obtaining loot from Grassy Plains monsters are increased by 75%.
Craftsmen save 15% of their ingredients when they craft items in the Countryside area.
Experience gained by fighting Crocodyls is increased by 150%.
The quantity of Dolomite and Obsidian harvested by miners is increased by 175%.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Wind Dojo are increased by 125%.
The reward bonus on groups of monsters increases every 3 hours in the Labyrinth of the Minotoror area.
An extra challenge is generated for fights against monsters in the Otomai's Ark area.
The loot generated by Perceptors is increased by 300% in the Kimbo's Canopy dungeon.
